title: Agentic AI has companies excited and security experts freaked out
description: Eight in 10 corporations now use artificial intelligence agents. But security researchers keep finding how easily they're manipulated.
content: Agentic AI is being heralded as the future of the generative AI revolution by leaders in the field. From ChatGPT’s integration of agentic features to the rise of Comet (the agent-based web browser from Perplexity) and Chinese-born Manus, the trend of... [946 chars]

title: Saudi startup launches world's first halal AI fluent in Arabic and Islamic culture
description: Saudi Arabia has entered the global artificial intelligence race with the launch of Humain Chat, a new Arabic-first chatbot designed to show the culture, language and values of the region.

title: 2025 AI Fest highlights future growth prospects for PH

title: Hong Kong wealth fund, Beijing AI academy team up to hunt for global AI talent
description: Hong Kong’s US$8 billion start-up investment fund partners with the Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence in a new talent initiative.
content:
Hong Kong’s government-owned wealth fund has partnered with one of China’s leading artificial intelligence agencies to attract global talent to the city, as it strengthens its commitment to transform into a technology hub.

title: It will be 'shield and sword', require colossal amount of system integration: CDS Anil Chauhan on Sudarshan Chakra
description: The chief of defence staff said the missile shield project will also have applications of artificial intelligence, advanced computation, data analytics, big data and quantum technologies

title: NASA, IBM Develop 'Surya': Here's How Advanced AI Model Can Protect From Solar Storms
description: NASA has launched an advanced artificial intelligence (AI) model in collaboration with IBM that excels in analysing solar observation data, paving the way for the prediction of solar storms with higher accuracy. Known as Surya, derived from the Sanskrit word for the Sun, this model marks a major leap in the use of AI for interpreting solar images and advancing space weather prediction.
